meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6832.

div.div: Battle of the Decades quarterfinal game 2.

td.p: Russ Schumacher, a university professor from Fort Collins, Colorado
Pam Mueller, a graduate student in psychology from Princeton, New Jersey
Tom Nosek, an aerospace consultant from Torrance, California

tr.td: IT'S GREEK MYTH TO ME
(Alex: We will show you the name in Greek, and we'll also give you a clue.)
TV IQ TEST
ON THE MAP
TECH TALK
THE MISSING MAN
"FOR"MATION
